mapper.select: SELECT s.SB_ID , s.SB_head , u2.NAME FROM SUPPLIERBOARD S INNER JOIN `user` u2 ON s.ID =u2.ID WHERE u2.`role` ="supplier" ORDER BY s.SB_ID DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sb_regdate) AS RN, s.*, u2.NAME AS name FROM SUPPLIERBOARD s INNER JOIN `user` u2 ON s.ID = u2.ID WHERE u2.`role` = "supplier" AND (
sb_title LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
u2.name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
sb_regdate LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
1 = 1
) ) AS B
WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount};
SELECT s.*, u.NAME ,u.PHONE FROM SUPPLIERBOARD S INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.ID = u.ID WHERE s.SB_ID = #{sb_id};
